title: Good on Jeff Bezos for dismantling a historic bridge for his monster yacht
content:
For most of us, the idea of getting a city to dismantle a historic bridge is ludicrous, but for the Big Dog Boss Man Jeff Bezos? Don’t make him laugh. Let’s backtrack: Jeff Bezos of Amazon fame is having a custom yacht built. Known as Y721, it’s set to become the world’s largest sailing yacht, reaching 127m tall when fully, uh, erect. It’s being made by a company called Oceanco in Rotterdam — but here’s where the Bald King has bumped into a problem: the Koningshaven bridge. Even with the central section raised, which is shown above, Bezos’ ALPHA ASS…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: Rotterdam is dismantling its historic Koningshaven bridge so Jeff Bezos can fit his monster yacht through. Thank god.
